metadata.title: CVE-2022-48646 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:sfc/siena: fix null pointer dereference in efx_hard_start_xmitLike in previous patch for sfc, prevent potential (but unlikely) NULLpointer dereference.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
